label: Kitchen and Home Organization
description: Products and tools for organizing and optimizing space in the kitchen and home.
intents: Maximize storage space in the kitchen
Protect surfaces from heat and spills
Keep kitchen and home clean and tidy

subcategories.description: Aprons and smocks for cooking and cleaning.
